content: Hey there! 😊 How can I help you today?
Thanks for asking—I'm doing great and ready to help! 😊 How about you?
Awesome to hear! 😄 What can I do for you today?
You got time to run today?
Absolutely—I’m always ready to run! 🏃‍♂️💨 What are we running through today? A task, some code, a workout plan, or maybe just a fun idea?
